pages.text: The $(item)Lightning Pedestal$() is a basic block used to reduce some materials (see: $(l:manipulation/entry_recipes)Known recipes$()) into primary essences.$(br) $(br)The $(item)Lightning Pedestal$() can also be used to electrify $(item)Nether Quartz$() into $(item)Vibrant Quartz$() and to destabilize $(item)Stone$().
